meanings.definition: Objects considered interesting or unusual, especially as a collection.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a variety of curiosa, including ancient artifacts and rare coins.
meanings.sent2: She had a shelf full of curiosa in her room, from seashells to vintage postcards.
meanings.sent3: The children found a box of curiosa in the attic and spent the afternoon exploring each item.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a treasure trove of curiosa, each memory a unique and precious find.
meanings.sent5: The market was a treasure hunt for curiosa, with each stall offering a new discovery.

meanings.definition: A collection of unusual or interesting objects.
meanings.sent1: The antique shop had a section dedicated to curiosa, showcasing oddities from around the world.
meanings.sent2: His curiosa included vintage toys, quirky gadgets, and rare books.
meanings.sent3: The curiosa on the shelves seemed to have a life of their own, each item telling a different story.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a museum of curiosa, with each piece carefully chosen and displayed.
meanings.sent5: The attic was a treasure trove of curiosa, with forgotten treasures waiting to be rediscovered.
